snippet: Arthur Blank, the owner of the Atlanta Falcons, craves a new home for his Atlanta Falcons, even though the 21-year-old Georgia Dome remains suitable in the short term.
abstract: Atlanta Falcons owner Arthur Blank craves a new home for his team, even though the 21-year-old Georgia Dome remains suitable in the short term; it remains to be seen if the region’s love for football will be enough to overcome its growing disdain for using taxpayer dollars to finance a new home for a lucrative sports franchise.
lead_paragraph: Arthur Blank, the owner of the Atlanta Falcons, craves a new home for his Atlanta Falcons, even though the 21-year-old Georgia Dome remains suitable in the short term.

headline.seo: Atlanta Falcons, Not Interested in Fixer-Upper, Seek a New Stadium
headline.main: Falcons Seek New Dome, Not Atlanta Fixer-Upper
headline.print_headline: Falcons Seek New Dome, Not Atlanta Fixer-Upper
